lead_paragraph: A birthday fund-raiser sponsored by a member of the New York City Water Board, who donated the maximum to Mayor Bill de Blasio’s election campaign, was “an honest mistake,” the mayor said.

headline.print_headline: De Blasio Donor Broke City Rules, Conflicts Board Says
headline.main: De Blasio Donor Violated City Rules, Conflicts Board Says

snippet: A birthday fund-raiser sponsored by a member of the New York City Water Board, who donated the maximum to Mayor Bill de Blasio’s election campaign, was “an honest mistake,” the mayor said....
abstract: New York City Conflicts of Interest Board says lawyer Joseph G Finnerty III violated rules by sponsoring Mayor Bill de Blasio's birthday fund-raiser while serving on city Water Board, position that bars him from fund-raising for mayor; de Blasio calls episode 'honest mistake.'
